REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0034 reute u f BC-AUSTRALIAN-TREASURY-N 03-20 0045

TEXT.TITLE: AUSTRALIAN TREASURY NOTE TENDER 500 MLN DLRS
TEXT.BODY: The Reserve Bank said it would offer 400 mln dlrs of 13-week treasury notes and 100 mln of 26-week notes for tender next week The bank said it would not take up any stock at next week's auction. REUTER
